getLanguage

public Query.Language getLanguage()
Returns:
The language of the query.

hibernate

public HibernateQueryAdapter hibernate()
Returns:
An adapter which enables you to use the query with Hibernate.

isFlyWeight

public boolean isFlyWeight()
Returns:
True if fly weight is enabled, false otherwise.

setFlyWeight

public void setFlyWeight(boolean flyWeight)
Parameters:
flyWeight - If set to true (the default), duplicate values from a query result will only be stored once in memory.

resultSet

public ResultSet resultSet(Connection connection,
                           Object args)
Retrieves a ResultSet from the given Connection.

Parameters:
connection - The Connection to use.
args - The arguments to the query. When a map, then the contents of the map. When an Object, then the JavaBean properties.
Returns:
a ResultSet.
See Also:
resultSet(Connection, Object)

listOfArrays

public List<Object[]> listOfArrays(Connection connection,
                                   Object args)
Retrieves a List of Object arrays from the given Connection.

Parameters:
connection - The Connection to use.
args - The arguments to the query. When a map, then the contents of the map. When an Object, then the JavaBean properties.
Returns:
A List of Object arrays from the given Connection.

listOfArrays

public static List<Object[]> listOfArrays(ResultSet resultSet,
                                          boolean flyWeight)
Converts a ResultSet into a List of Object arrays.

Parameters:
resultSet - The ResultSet to convert.
flyWeight - If true, duplicate values are stored in memory only once.
Returns:
A List of Object arrays containing the data from the result set.

listOfMaps

public List<Map<String,Object>> listOfMaps(Connection connection,
                                           Object args)
Retrieve a List of Maps from the given Connection. The maps contain the column names from the query as keys and the column values as the map's values.

Parameters:
connection - The Connection to use.
args - The arguments to the query. When a map, then the contents of the map. When an Object, then the JavaBean properties.
Returns:
A List of Maps.

updateChecked

public int updateChecked(Connection connection,
                         Object args)
                  throws SQLException
Executes an update (DML) or a DDL query.

Parameters:
connection - The Connection to use.
args - The arguments to the query. When a map, then the contents of the map. When an Object, then the JavaBean properties.
Returns:
The row count from a DML statement or 0 for SQL that does not return anything.
Throws:
SQLException - Whenever the query caused an SQLException.

update

public int update(Connection connection,
                  Object args)
Executes an update (DML) or a DDL query. SQLExceptions are wrapped in a QueryException.

Parameters:
connection - The Connection to use.
args - The arguments to the query. When a map, then the contents of the map. When an Object, then the JavaBean properties.
Returns:
The row count from a DML statement or 0 for SQL that does not return anything.

getPreparedStatement

public PreparedStatement getPreparedStatement(Connection connection,
                                              Object args)
Returns a PreparedStatement for the query.

Parameters:
connection - The Connection to use.
args - The arguments to the query. When a map, then the contents of the map. When an Object, then the JavaBean properties.
Returns:
a PreparedStatement for the query.

getPreparedSQL

public Query.PreparedSQL getPreparedSQL(Object args)
Returns a prepared SQL string together with a parameters array.

Parameters:
args - The arguments to the query. When a map, then the contents of the map. When an Object, then the JavaBean properties.
Returns:
A prepared SQL string together with a parameters array.
